full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 181 of 197 2722 LCHVMAX6 1 need for me to testify. 2 THE COURT: All right. 3 Ms. Sternheim, have you discussed the issue with your 4 client? 5 MS. STERNHEIM: Yes, we have. 6 THE COURT: And you've advised her that it is her 7 decision? 8 MS. STERNHEIM: Yes, we have. 9 THE COURT: She's just indicated that her decision is 10 not to testify; is that correct? 11 MS. STERNHEIM: That is correct. 12 THE COURT: Ms. Maxwell, that is correct? 13 THE DEFENDANT: Your Honor, that is correct. 14 THE COURT: Thank you. 15 You may be seated. 16 MS. STERNHEIM: Thank you. 17 THE COURT: All right. Five minutes? 18 MS. COMEY: Yes, please, your Honor. 19 THE COURT: Okay. 20 (Recess) 21 THE COURT: Counsel, are you ready? 22 MS. COMEY: Yes, your Honor. 23 THE COURT: On the defense? 24 MR. EVERDELL: Yes, your Honor. 25 THE COURT: Okay. One thought for Monday. I'm going SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C.
